Quote.Author: Reinhold Niebuhr
Quote.QuoteValue: Forgiveness is the final form of love

Quote.Author: Reinhold Niebuhr
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing we do, however virtuous, can be accomplished alone; therefore we are saved by love

Quote.Author: Reinhold Niebuhr
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing that is worth doing can be achieved in a lifetime; therefore we must be saved by hope

Quote.Author: Reinhold Niebuhr
Quote.QuoteValue: Evil is not to be traced back to the individual but to the collective behavior of humanity

Quote.Author: Reinhold Niebuhr
Quote.QuoteValue: The sad duty of politics is to establish justice in a sinful world

Quote.Author: Reinhold Niebuhr
Quote.QuoteValue: If we survive danger it steels our courage more than anything else

Quote.Author: Reinhold Niebuhr
Quote.QuoteValue: Our age knows nothing but reaction, and leaps from one extreme to another

Quote.Author: Reinhold Niebuhr
Quote.QuoteValue: Goodness, armed with power, is corrupted; and pure love without power is destroyed

Quote.Author: Reinhold Niebuhr
Quote.QuoteValue: Democracy is finding proximate solutions to insoluble problems

Quote.Author: Rem Koolhaas
Quote.QuoteValue: The areas of consensus shift unbelievably fast; the bubbles of certainty are constantly exploding

Quote.Author: Rem Koolhaas
Quote.QuoteValue: We live in an almost perfect stillness and work with incredible urgency

Quote.Author: Rem Koolhaas
Quote.QuoteValue: The luxury of our position now is that we can almost assemble any team to address any issue

Quote.Author: Rem Koolhaas
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have this reputation you can sit back and endure it, or you can try to do things with it

Quote.Author: Rem Koolhaas
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not possible to live in this age if you don't have a sense of many contradictory forces

Quote.Author: Rem Koolhaas
Quote.QuoteValue: Infrastructure is much more important than architecture

Quote.Author: Rem Koolhaas
Quote.QuoteValue: The acceptance of certain realities doesn't preclude idealism. It can lead to certain breakthroughs

Quote.Author: Rem Koolhaas
Quote.QuoteValue: Our office acts like a kind of educational establishment and we are very careful who we educate

Quote.Author: Rem Koolhaas
Quote.QuoteValue: Not many architects have the luxury to reject significant things

Quote.Author: Rem Koolhaas
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing Dutch about my architecture

Quote.Author: Rene Descartes
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest minds are capable of the greatest vices as well as of the greatest virtues

Quote.Author: Rene Descartes
Quote.QuoteValue: I think; therefore I am

Quote.Author: Rene Descartes
Quote.QuoteValue: Divide each difficulty into as many parts as is feasible and necessary to resolve it

Quote.Author: Rene Descartes
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not enough to have a good mind; the main thing is to use it well

Quote.Author: Rene Descartes
Quote.QuoteValue: Illusory joy is often worth more than genuine sorrow

Quote.Author: Rene Descartes
Quote.QuoteValue: A state is better governed which has few laws, and those laws strictly observed

Quote.Author: Rene Descartes
Quote.QuoteValue: Except our own thoughts, there is nothing absolutely in our power

Quote.Author: Rene Descartes
Quote.QuoteValue: Travelling is almost like talking with those of other centuries

Quote.Author: Rene Descartes
Quote.QuoteValue: Perfect numbers like perfect men are very rare

Quote.Author: Rene Descartes
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever anyone has offended me, I try to raise my soul so high that the offense cannot reach it

Quote.Author: Rene Redzepi
Quote.QuoteValue: People will travel anywhere for good food - it's crazy

Quote.Author: Rene Redzepi
Quote.QuoteValue: I would love to eat a really great burger, but it doesn't exist in our part of the world

Quote.Author: Rene Redzepi
Quote.QuoteValue: Fine dining is an occasional treat for most people

Quote.Author: Rene Redzepi
Quote.QuoteValue: My last meal on Earth, I would love it to be a bowl of blueberries with cold cream

Quote.Author: Rene Redzepi
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no conflict between a better meal and a better world

Quote.Author: Rene Redzepi
Quote.QuoteValue: I only have the restaurant. If I do other things, it's only to do with the restaurant

Quote.Author: Rene Redzepi
Quote.QuoteValue: When you start at catering college, nobody prepares you for a book tour or public speaking

Quote.Author: Rene Redzepi
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't crack jokes because I don't have any

Quote.Author: Rene Redzepi
Quote.QuoteValue: The restaurant industry is brutal

Quote.Author: Rene Redzepi
Quote.QuoteValue: I never cooked at home - my father was the chef

Quote.Author: Renee Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: Opera is really fun

Quote.Author: Renee Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: Having to travel so much plays havoc with your personal life

Quote.Author: Renee Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: Very few opera singers in history have been able to cross into popular music

Quote.Author: Renee Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like to sing loud

Quote.Author: Renee Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: For years, I had no time for exploratory travel

Quote.Author: Renee Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: Every singer eventually gets around to a Christmas disc

Quote.Author: Renee Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: My worry is that opera will become an historic art form as opposed to a living, breathing thing

Quote.Author: Renee Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to record anything unless it can be great and genuinely interesting

Quote.Author: Renee Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: I think singing it when it's done well is extremely natural. It feels great

Quote.Author: Renee Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: I think singing is one of the most natural things that human beings do, but it's difficult

Quote.Author: Rex Tillerson
Quote.QuoteValue: None of us live in a zero-risk world

Quote.Author: Rex Tillerson
Quote.QuoteValue: You can be afraid of a lot of things that you don't understand

Quote.Author: Rex Tillerson
Quote.QuoteValue: There are a thousand ways you can be told 'no' in this country

Quote.Author: Rex Tillerson
Quote.QuoteValue: Compromise on ethical conduct is not an option

Quote.Author: Rex Tillerson
Quote.QuoteValue: I never saw a bureaucracy produce a single barrel of oil

Quote.Author: Rex Tillerson
Quote.QuoteValue: We have spent our entire existence adapting

Quote.Author: Rex Tillerson
Quote.QuoteValue: My philosophy is to make money

Quote.Author: Rex Tillerson
Quote.QuoteValue: The Boy Scouts, of course, had an influence on me because I learned about service in the community

Quote.Author: Rex Tillerson
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't discount that people's fears are their fears

Quote.Author: Rex Tillerson
Quote.QuoteValue: We go out, we explore, we take risk. And our successes have to pay for all that

Quote.Author: Rey Mysterio
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm enjoying life at my fullest. Sometimes you realize that money isn't everything

Quote.Author: Rey Mysterio
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite place to read is next to the pond in my backyard

Quote.Author: Rey Mysterio
Quote.QuoteValue: As you get older, your body doesn't hold up as much

Quote.Author: Rey Mysterio
Quote.QuoteValue: Soccer runs in my blood

Quote.Author: Rey Mysterio
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't regret any steps that I take in life

Quote.Author: Rey Mysterio
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never had any prima donna attitude against me. It's always been very respectful

Quote.Author: Rey Mysterio
Quote.QuoteValue: My uncle was a second father to me. I spent most of my childhood with him

Quote.Author: Rey Mysterio
Quote.QuoteValue: That whole 'Giant Killer' era was actually kind of fun for me. That is what elevated my name in WCW

Quote.Author: Rey Mysterio
Quote.QuoteValue: It's all about the style and what you can bring to the table - how exciting you can be

Quote.Author: Rey Mysterio
Quote.QuoteValue: When you talk about Mexican culture, it's wrestling and soccer

Quote.Author: Rhys Ifans
Quote.QuoteValue: Shyness is invariably a suppression of something. It's almost a fear of what you're capable of

Quote.Author: Rhys Ifans
Quote.QuoteValue: I am essentially very shy. Which, I guess, is why I'm very good at not being shy

Quote.Author: Rhys Ifans
Quote.QuoteValue: My personal life is invented for me, so why bother?

Quote.Author: Rhys Ifans
Quote.QuoteValue: I am an artisan. I only became an artist when people watch what I do. That is when it becomes art

Quote.Author: Rhys Ifans
Quote.QuoteValue: A pub can be a magical place

Quote.Author: Rhys Ifans
Quote.QuoteValue: My work is my way of expressing myself without being arrested

Quote.Author: Rhys Ifans
Quote.QuoteValue: In Wales, singing and storytelling are party skills, not professions

Quote.Author: Rhys Ifans
Quote.QuoteValue: I freely admit that I am a bit of a misfit

Quote.Author: Rhys Ifans
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was taught Shakespeare in school, it was such an alien, sanitized puzzle, it made no sense

Quote.Author: Rhys Ifans
Quote.QuoteValue: We're in an age of enlightenment, and we have a choice as a society which path to take

Quote.Author: Richard Bach
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it

Quote.Author: Richard Bach
Quote.QuoteValue: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours; if they don't they never were

Quote.Author: Richard Bach
Quote.QuoteValue: True love stories never have endings

Quote.Author: Richard Bach
Quote.QuoteValue: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world the master calls a butterfly

Quote.Author: Richard Bach
Quote.QuoteValue: Your conscience is the measure of the honesty of your selfishness. Listen to it carefully

Quote.Author: Richard Bach
Quote.QuoteValue: Strong beliefs win strong men, and then make them stronger

Quote.Author: Richard Bach
Quote.QuoteValue: A professional writer is an amateur who didn't quit

Quote.Author: Richard Bach
Quote.QuoteValue: I gave my life to become the person I am right now. Was it worth it?

Quote.Author: Richard Bach
Quote.QuoteValue: In order to live free and happily you must sacrifice boredom. It is not always an easy sacrifice

Quote.Author: Richard Bach
Quote.QuoteValue: To fly as fast as thought, you must begin by knowing that you have already arrived

Quote.Author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan
Quote.QuoteValue: Won't you come into the garden? I would like my roses to see you

Quote.Author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan
Quote.QuoteValue: Be just before you are generous

Quote.Author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan
Quote.QuoteValue: Fertilizer does no good in a heap, but a little spread around works miracles all over

Quote.Author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan
Quote.QuoteValue: There is not a passion so strongly rooted in the human heart as envy

Quote.Author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan
Quote.QuoteValue: You know it is not my interest to pay the principal, or my principal to pay the interest

Quote.Author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan
Quote.QuoteValue: The surest way to fail is not to determine to succeed

Quote.Author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan
Quote.QuoteValue: Those that vow the most are the least sincere

Quote.Author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan
Quote.QuoteValue: He is indebted to his memory for his jests and to his imagination for his facts

Quote.Author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan
Quote.QuoteValue: You write with ease to show your breeding, but easy writing's curst hard reading

Quote.Author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan
Quote.QuoteValue: A bumper of good liquor will end a contest quicker than justice, judge, or vicar

Quote.Author: Richard Burton
Quote.QuoteValue: An actor is something less than a man, while an actress is something more than a woman

Quote.Author: Richard Burton
Quote.QuoteValue: This diamond has so many carats it's almost a turnip

Quote.Author: Richard Burton
Quote.QuoteValue: The more I study religions the more I am convinced that man never worshipped anything but himself

Quote.Author: Richard Burton
Quote.QuoteValue: You may be as vicious about me as you please. You will only do me justice

Quote.Author: Richard Burton
Quote.QuoteValue: They lard their lean books with the fat of others work

Quote.Author: Richard Burton
Quote.QuoteValue: The Welsh are all actors. It's only the bad ones who become professional

Quote.Author: Richard Burton
Quote.QuoteValue: A man that hoards up riches and enjoys them not, is like an ass that carries gold and eats thistles

Quote.Author: Richard Burton
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate myself and my face in particular

Quote.Author: Richard Burton
Quote.QuoteValue: I abhor mere prettiness

Quote.Author: Richard Burton
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone can play Henry VIII. I mean, even Robert Shaw... has played it

Quote.Author: Richard E. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: Proving yourself in a field where the casualty rate is so notoriously high is an ongoing challenge

Quote.Author: Richard E. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: Never give up. You only get one life. Go for it!

Quote.Author: Richard E. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: Always have an answer - even if you change your mind five minutes later

Quote.Author: Richard E. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: I would still like to go to the moon before I die

Quote.Author: Richard E. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: Unless you are an enormous name, you never stop auditioning

Quote.Author: Richard E. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a hoarder

Quote.Author: Richard E. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: I like fixing things

Quote.Author: Richard E. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think it's the case that 'posh actors' get more work than others

Quote.Author: Richard E. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: Actors always think that others are getting more work than them. In my case, they usually are

Quote.Author: Richard E. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: I would love to play your common, everyday guy, but I never get cast as that

Quote.Author: Richard Engel
Quote.QuoteValue: Every child is taught if you try to please everyone, you end up upsetting everyone

Quote.Author: Richard Engel
Quote.QuoteValue: 9/11 was a terrible, horrific, tragic day

Quote.Author: Richard Engel
Quote.QuoteValue: The Sahara is Africa's great divide

Quote.Author: Richard Engel
Quote.QuoteValue: Persia is 7,000 years old and will fight to survive

Quote.Author: Richard Engel
Quote.QuoteValue: For many foreign fighters, the jihad in Iraq and Syria is a commuter war

Quote.Author: Richard Engel
Quote.QuoteValue: Every war has its demons

Quote.Author: Richard Engel
Quote.QuoteValue: Fences and walls can be effective and even soothing, at least for those who build them

Quote.Author: Richard Engel
Quote.QuoteValue: I have seen heroics - soldiers saving other soldiers' lives - and horrors

Quote.Author: Richard Engel
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of Iran's empowerment is a result of the war in Iraq

Quote.Author: Richard Engel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm basically a pacifist

Quote.Author: Richard J. Daley
Quote.QuoteValue: The policeman isn't there to create disorder; the policeman is there to preserve disorder

Quote.Author: Richard J. Daley
Quote.QuoteValue: Good government is good politics

Quote.Author: Richard J. Daley
Quote.QuoteValue: The strength of the Democratic Party of Cook County is not something that just happened

Quote.Author: Richard J. Daley
Quote.QuoteValue: The police are not here to create disorder, they're here to preserve disorder

Quote.Author: Richard J. Daley
Quote.QuoteValue: Power is dangerous unless you have humility

Quote.Author: Richard J. Daley
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't worry if they're Democrats or Republicans. Give them service and they'll become Democrats

Quote.Author: Richard J. Daley
Quote.QuoteValue: No poll can equal the day-to-day visits of the men and women of the Democratic Party

Quote.Author: Richard J. Daley
Quote.QuoteValue: They have vilified me, they have crucified me; yes, they have even criticized me

Quote.Author: Richard J. Daley
Quote.QuoteValue: We shall reach greater and greater platitudes of achievment

Quote.Author: Richard J. Daley
Quote.QuoteValue: We are proud to have with us the poet lariat of Chicago

Quote.Author: Richard M. Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: If you take no risks, you will suffer no defeats. But if you take no risks, you win no victories

Quote.Author: Richard M. Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: The finest steel has to go through the hottest fire

Quote.Author: Richard M. Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: It is necessary for me to establish a winner image. Therefore, I have to beat somebody

Quote.Author: Richard M. Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: Finishing second in the Olympics gets you silver. Finishing second in politics gets you oblivion

Quote.Author: Richard M. Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest honor history can bestow is that of peacemaker

Quote.Author: Richard M. Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: Voters quickly forget what a man says

Quote.Author: Richard M. Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: When the President does it, that means that it's not illegal

Quote.Author: Richard M. Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, I screwed it up real good, didn't I?

Quote.Author: Richard M. Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: People react to fear, not love; they don't teach that in Sunday School, but it's true

Quote.Author: Richard M. Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: I can take it. The tougher it gets, the cooler I get

Quote.Author: Richard Pryor
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a thin line between to laugh with and to laugh at

Quote.Author: Richard Pryor
Quote.QuoteValue: I became a performer because it was what I enjoyed doing

Quote.Author: Richard Pryor
Quote.QuoteValue: What I am for is justice for everyone, just like it says in the Constitution

Quote.Author: Richard Pryor
Quote.QuoteValue: Booty is just a ghetto expression, and I'm just a booty star

Quote.Author: Richard Pryor
Quote.QuoteValue: I ain't no movie star, man. I'm a booty star

Quote.Author: Richard Pryor
Quote.QuoteValue: I know that if I wasn't scared, something's wrong, because the thrill is what's scary

Quote.Author: Richard Pryor
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a loner and never hung out with anyone. I never had any friends

Quote.Author: Richard Pryor
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a lot more hypocrisy than before. Racism has gone back underground

Quote.Author: Richard Pryor
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, I'm religious. God has shown me things, made certain ways clear to me

Quote.Author: Richard Pryor
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in divine forces and energies

Quote.Author: Richard Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: The past is what the past is

Quote.Author: Richard Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: You rest better coming off of a win

Quote.Author: Richard Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: You can know a person is a good person or a bad person by who they are, not by what they look like

Quote.Author: Richard Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: I talk a big game because I carry a big stick

Quote.Author: Richard Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: I think my game measures up pretty well to myself

Quote.Author: Richard Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a lot of racism still alive and still active

Quote.Author: Richard Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter who you are, no matter what you do, you'd like to witness history

Quote.Author: Richard Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: The goal has always been to stay in Seattle and continue to play for the Seahawks

Quote.Author: Richard Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in curses. I believe in God

Quote.Author: Richard Sherman
Quote.QuoteValue: There's always been adversity, wherever I've gone

Quote.Author: Richard Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone in this world is somehow connected. So why not just be nice to everybody

Quote.Author: Richard Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Count your blessings. You are one of a kind. There's no one in the world like you. You are amazing

Quote.Author: Richard Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: You are one of a kind and unique. Never forget that

Quote.Author: Richard Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Work hard, take care of yourself, and you'll be just fine

Quote.Author: Richard Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been going to shopping malls since I was on General Hospital

Quote.Author: Richard Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: One day I may be meeting you and hearing how you've changed your life by saying, 'Farewell to Fat'

Quote.Author: Richard Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have to teach anymore, I don't have to work anymore, God has been really good to me

Quote.Author: Richard Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: You shouldn't make fun of people who have issues

Quote.Author: Richard Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never lived in the visual world. I live very much in an emotional-contact world

Quote.Author: Richard Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: I started my own class for people like me who can't find any place else to go

Quote.Author: Rick James
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm too old to do crazy things anymore

Quote.Author: Rick James
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't have rock and roll without drugs, you can't have rock and roll without sex

Quote.Author: Rick James
Quote.QuoteValue: I was going to get drafted, but I didn't really want to go into the Army

Quote.Author: Rick James
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe everything happens under God's plan anyway

Quote.Author: Rick James
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really not tailored for responsibility

Quote.Author: Rick James
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have aluminum foil on my windows anymore

Quote.Author: Rick James
Quote.QuoteValue: I just live one day at a time

Quote.Author: Rick James
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm finally locked into the now, and it's great

Quote.Author: Rick James
Quote.QuoteValue: I had always been a free spirit and always gotten what I wanted

Quote.Author: Rick James
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a long way from Ike Turner

Quote.Author: Rick Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: Dark economic clouds are dissipating into an emerging blue sky of opportunity

Quote.Author: Rick Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: Texas created more jobs in 2008 than the rest of the states - combined

Quote.Author: Rick Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: The fact is there is forgiveness for those who seek God. And I believe in the power of redemption

Quote.Author: Rick Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: Democracy functions best when we have an active citizenry

Quote.Author: Rick Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: Every life is precious

Quote.Author: Rick Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: Guns require a finger to pull the trigger

Quote.Author: Rick Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't say I was running, did I?

Quote.Author: Rick Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: We can't have deficit spending in Texas. You have to balance your budget every two years

Quote.Author: Rick Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: Obama is a president, who I think is anti-jobs

Quote.Author: Rick Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: Our shared conservative values, our belief in the individual is the great hope of our nation

Quote.Author: Rick Pitino
Quote.QuoteValue: Excellence is the unlimited ability to improve the quality of what you have to offer

Quote.Author: Rick Pitino
Quote.QuoteValue: Avoid cynical and negative people like the plague. They are killers of potential

Quote.Author: Rick Pitino
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd learned how much happiness money can bring you. Very little

Quote.Author: Rick Pitino
Quote.QuoteValue: If I had one regret in life... it's that I was not more humble at an earlier age

Quote.Author: Rick Pitino
Quote.QuoteValue: Basketball has consumed me since the age of 7 or 8. I don't know what I would do without it

Quote.Author: Rick Pitino
Quote.QuoteValue: Humility is what makes teams great. I've preached it for a long period of time

Quote.Author: Rick Pitino
Quote.QuoteValue: I care what people think, but it doesn't change my opinion of how to do things

Quote.Author: Rick Pitino
Quote.QuoteValue: After September 11, I don't think people really believe things like this are all that important

Quote.Author: Rick Pitino
Quote.QuoteValue: He knew I enjoyed the relationships of college basketball. All along, he was the wise one

Quote.Author: Rick Pitino
Quote.QuoteValue: The other guys just caught lightning in a bottle with a great game

Quote.Author: Rick Riordan
Quote.QuoteValue: I do like to wrap things up and leave some things to the readers' imagination

Quote.Author: Rick Riordan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always found the second book in a series is the hardest to write

Quote.Author: Rick Riordan
Quote.QuoteValue: The images from the book you make in your head are always going to be the best images

Quote.Author: Rick Riordan
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to have a simple workplace

Quote.Author: Rick Riordan
Quote.QuoteValue: I think kids will read more good books than we can possibly produce

Quote.Author: Rick Riordan
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that kids have a greater capacity for processing things than we give them credit for

Quote.Author: Rick Riordan
Quote.QuoteValue: I have more ideas than I'll ever be able to write in five lifetimes

Quote.Author: Rick Riordan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a teacher still, but with a much larger classroom

Quote.Author: Rick Riordan
Quote.QuoteValue: Kids are the audience I know best

Quote.Author: Rick Riordan
Quote.QuoteValue: Turkey, Australia, and Japan are three of my top destinations

Quote.Author: Rick Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: You want people to feel comfortable to walk in their neighborhoods, go out and shop, do business

Quote.Author: Rick Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: My job is to get people back to work and make tough decisions. I've been willing to do it

Quote.Author: Rick Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: In Florida, we're the best melting pot in the world. We love everybody coming to our state

Quote.Author: Rick Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Shipping by water is cheaper than by rail, which is cheaper than by truck

Quote.Author: Rick Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: America's greatness is largely because of how we value the weakest among us

Quote.Author: Rick Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I think we ought to leave the law exactly the way it is, the 14th amendment

Quote.Author: Rick Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not going to suggest to a delegate at what they ought to do

Quote.Author: Rick Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: No U.S. citizen is being kicked off any voter rolls

Quote.Author: Rick Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: The hospital industry to this day works its tail off to do the right thing

Quote.Author: Rick Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that free-market principles will solve our healthcare problems

Quote.Author: Rick Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: Humility is not thinking less of yourself, it's thinking of yourself less

Quote.Author: Rick Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way you can serve God is by serving other people

Quote.Author: Rick Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: You were made by God and for God, and until you understand that, life will never make sense

Quote.Author: Rick Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: If God only used perfect people, nothing would get done. God will use anybody if you're available

Quote.Author: Rick Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: You never know God is all you need until God is all you have

Quote.Author: Rick Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: I serve a higher power, Jesus Christ. I make no apologies in saying that

Quote.Author: Rick Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: When life doesn't make sense, we can still have peace

Quote.Author: Rick Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: My ultimate goal... is for you to live the life you're intended to live

Quote.Author: Rick Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: Living in the light of eternity changes your priorities

Quote.Author: Rick Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: So I would say God hates war, but God loves every soldier

Quote.Author: Rickey Henderson
Quote.QuoteValue: Rickey don't like it when Rickey can't find Rickey's limo

Quote.Author: Rickey Henderson
Quote.QuoteValue: Lou Brock was a great base stealer but today I am the greatest

Quote.Author: Rickey Henderson
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the game and I wanted to continue playing. It came to a time that I had to stop

Quote.Author: Rickey Henderson
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you can accept failure, you can have fun and success

Quote.Author: Rickey Henderson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm disappointed about how my career ended

Quote.Author: Rickey Henderson
Quote.QuoteValue: If my uniform doesn't get dirty, I haven't done anything in the baseball game

Quote.Author: Rickey Henderson
Quote.QuoteValue: I like playing for Oakland, they have a very colorful uniform

Quote.Author: Rickey Henderson
Quote.QuoteValue: My impact on the game was going out there and making things happen

Quote.Author: Rickey Henderson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I ever got proper credit about being smart about the game

Quote.Author: Rickey Henderson
Quote.QuoteValue: People say I stole a lot of bases. I stole the bases for a reason. I crossed the plate

Quote.Author: Ricky Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Nine in the box... that's a football term
